entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.44.0 - Release - Clickhouse support, Postgres smart parser ui tweaks, dependency updates
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

Features: - Clickhouse support ü•≥ (yay! let us know if you run into any bugs) - Add smart parsing Postgres URL (a big thanks to @HarshDodiya1)

Security Fixes [Availability] - Fix memory unbound consumption bug (a big thanks to @thevilledev)

Maintenance: - Small UI tweaks üé® - Dependency updates :dependabot: - Move to Parcel for better build performance (fix up the file server to work with the new bundle) - Make the notification styling matching Clidey platform's.

What's Changed

  • add ClickHouse support by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/211
  • update clickhouse raw execute query to use params by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/264
  • build(deps): bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/263
  • build(deps): bump rollup from 2.79.1 to 2.79.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/262
  • build(deps): bump dset from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/261
  • build(deps): bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/260
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/driver/postgres from 1.5.9 to 1.5.11 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/254
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.19 to 2.5.20 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/250
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.56 to 0.17.57 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/249
  • build(deps): bump @types/react-dom from 18.3.0 to 18.3.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/246
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.12 to 4.17.13 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/244
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.6.2 to 6.6.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/242
  • build(deps): bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/267
  • build(deps): bump micromatch from 4.0.7 to 4.0.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/266
  • build(deps): bump express from 4.19.2 to 4.21.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/259
  • build(deps): bump webpack from 5.92.0 to 5.97.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/265
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.11.8 to 3.12.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/257
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 6.27.0 to 7.0.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/253
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 3.4.14 to 3.4.16 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/270
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.31.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/283
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/282
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.57 to 0.17.60 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/277
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/driver/sqlite from 1.5.6 to 1.5.7 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/276
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/react from 16.0.1 to 16.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/274
  • build(deps): bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/279
  • build(deps): bump @highlight-run/react from 7.0.3 to 8.0.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/273
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/272
  • Update README.md using remote ollama server by @learningpro in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/251
  • feat(auth): fix dos attack bug by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/293
  • [FR] Added feature to automatically parse postgres url when pasting by @HarshDodiya1 in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/255

New Contributors

  • @learningpro made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/251
  • @HarshDodiya1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/255

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.43.0...0.44.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.45.0 - Release - Fix login with profile flow and couple improvements
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

Predictable Storage Unit Sorting: - Thanks to the contribution by @FunnyPocketBook, storage units are now sorted to provide greater predictability and a more consistent user experience.

Enhanced Logging for Pre-Built Login Profiles:
- Improved logging has been added to provide clearer and more actionable error messages when parsing pre-built login profiles from environment variables fails.

üêõ Bug Fixes

LoginWithProfile Fix:
- Resolved an issue with LoginWithProfile where it failed to work properly with pre-built login profiles provided through environment variables. It should now function as intended.

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • Sort tables in storage-unit alphabetically by @FunnyPocketBook in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/310

New Contributors

  • @FunnyPocketBook made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/310

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.44.0...0.45.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.46.0 - Release - Fix path traversal bug for sqlite, new clickhouse options, and support for OpenAI-like URLs
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

Added new clickhouse options for HTTP - Thanks to the contribution by @Slach, we've got additional options for clickhouse support, HTTP protocol, TLS mode, readonly and debug.

Support for OpenAI-like URLs - Thanks to the contribution by @learningpro, we support OpenAI-like URLs now. Check the readme to see how to get started!

Support for env variable aliases - https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/323

Replaced the Monaco Editor with Codemirror - Makes the frontend lighter and is completely packaged.

Added loading indicators in several places to provide visual feedback to the user - https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/75

üêõ Bug Fixes

Path traversal issue for sqlite - Resolved an issue with how the database location for sqlite was being parsed resulting in the possibility of path traversal. Thanks to @nnse for catching that one!

Parameter injection issue for MySQL - Resolved an issue where it was possible to inject parameters using the UI. Alongside this, we took the time to go through all of the other connectors and check how we're handling input. Please let us know if you find anything out of place! Thanks to @nnse for catching that one!

Unique table IDs for columns with the same name - https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/316

Tables have correct # index number when paginating

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • add additional options for clickhouse support by @Slach in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/300
  • Add OpenAI Compatible Provider by @learningpro in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/252
  • Add Alias logic by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/331
  • Ensure ids are unique for columns with same name by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/332
  • Replace monaco editor with code mirror by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/333
  • Add loading states by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/336

New Contributors

  • @Slach made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/300

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.45.0...0.46.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.46.1 - Patch | Fix the MySQL connection init to allow native passwords for older versions
entry.content:
Fixes: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/351

üêõ Bug Fixes This PR fixes the initialization of the MySQL connection (to allow native passwords - to support older versions of MySQL). We also default to UTC timezone (the default behavior).

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.47.0 - Big Release - Theme upgrade, reborn Scratchpad, so much more #397
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

Improved Plugin System: - To speed up our development, we modified the core backend so that adding new data sources is easier and more unified. There's less repeated code and more developer enjoyment üòä

Theme Upgrade:
- WhoDB has a new look! Our designers spent some time looking at how to make WhoDB look more streamlined and professional. Let us know your thoughts üíÖ

Tailwind Upgrade to V4 - Alongside the theme changes, we have moved up to Tailwind V4 üå¨Ô∏è

End-to-end Testing - More stability, we should be able to update faster now. Expect bugs and breakage üò≥

Scratchpad Reborn - The Scratchpad saw some major love in this release. We have added: - Pages - organise your scratchpads into individual notebooks üóÑÔ∏è - History - see what queries you ran üìú - Query replay - instantly rerun a query from the History view üîÑ - Query edit - want to modify a query you ran a day ago? Go on then. Do it from the History view üêô

üêõ Bug Fixes

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies üîß

Tweaks to the Update and Delete logic - More flexibility in updating and deleting rows üö°

üìñ Admin stuff

Apache 2 License - WhoDB is officially Apache 2 licensed! We have moved away from the GPL due to its restrictive nature. Unfortunately, we have had to take away some GPL code that we did not have permission for, but, we will recreate the functionality as soon as possible üöÑ

https://whodb.com is live! - Happy happy ü•Ç

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump highlight.run from 9.7.2 to 9.14.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/382
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.13 to 4.17.16 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/370
  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group in /frontend with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/383
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 6.28.0 to 7.4.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/380
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.12.3 to 3.13.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/381
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.60 to 0.17.68 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/377
  • Add plugin system, updates to tailwind, theme by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/395
  • update instances to whodb.com from whodb.clidey.com by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/396
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/cli from 5.0.3 to 5.0.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/390
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript-operations from 4.4.0 to 4.6.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/392
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.1.2 to 4.1.6 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/391

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.46.1...0.47.0
